p: Essential oils obtained from the unity of squeezing and extracting natural oils, National Research Centre (NRC). This experiment included examining the influence of thyme oil at the levels of 300,400 and 500 mg/l of, and clove oil at 150,250, and 500 mg/l. The distilled water (control) and 0.4% of sucrose as carbon source used as controls and were pulsed for the same period with distilled water. Tween-20 â€³0.1% v/v" was used to dissolve the oils before adding them to the preservative solution.
